meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Indonesia.
meanings.sent1: In Indonesia, you can buy many things with just one rupia.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rupia when I visited Indonesia.
meanings.sent3: The rupia in my pocket felt like a tiny treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million rupia.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rupia notes fluttered in the wind.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in India, Pakistan, and other countries in South Asia.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother gave me some rupia for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: The market vendor quoted the price in rupia.
meanings.sent3: I found a forgotten rupia in my old jacket pocket.
meanings.sent4: His words were like valuable rupia, full of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The rupia coins jingled in his pocket as he walked.
